original_title: Interest-free student loan scheme for higher education in private universities
original_body_lines: COLOMBO(News 1st): The calling of applications for the interest-free student loan scheme for higher education in private universities commences today.
Accordingly, 5000 students who have faced the G.C.E Advanced Level examination in the years 2019, 2020, and 2021 will be able to apply for the interest-free student loan.
Students will be able to apply for the interest-free student loan from the 4th to the 7th of July says State Minister of Finance Ranjith Siyambalapitiya.
If any competition arose for the loan scheme, it will be decided according to the Z-Score of the students added State Minister of Finance Ranjith Siyambalapitiya.
